action_from_previous.description: Typed 'This is the initial content for my test page.'

state_description: After type: Typed 'This is the initial content for my test page.'
llm_enhanced_instruction: In the body of the new page beneath the title, type 'This is the initial content for my test page.' to add your first block of content.
llm_context: The sentence appears as a text block under the title, and an 'Edited just now' autosave indicator confirms your changes—your page now has content.
